name: Bumble Bee Adventure
description:
Bumble Bee Adventure:

Bumble Bee is adventure and fun game to play. This adventure game has what every fun and easy to play game needs. Good HD graphics, fun gameplay with many different scenarios.

This game is nice for your kids, who need to pass time and learn how to play games.

player has one job in this game and this job is simple..
* Save the forest from monsters
* play the unlimited gameplay of shooting
* share score to the world
* kill all angry bees.
Download and enjoy this game :)
